string-array.name: message1
string-array.item: I am Kentaro Okabe, a sophomore of Department of IC, school of Engineering, Den University.
Finally, it\'s time to reach the second semester.
I have a class by the name of "Data Structures and Algorithms" for my first class of Thursday, though.
Somehow, I feel different atmosphere from other classes.

string-array.name: message2
string-array.item: My impression is that the class is quite difficult.

string-array.name: question2
string-array.item: For the present, I am seeing whether my friends can do it well.

string-array.name: messageending
string-array.item: First, I studied it. But, it was so serious.
Nevertheless, I studied it hard so that I can enjoy it more and more.
Finally, I received my result. Believe it or not, it is a grade of S.
Even though I didn\'t mind what result I can receive the while, I am happy for receiving the good result.
Moreover, since I make sense of programming, I can enjoy programming.

string-array.name: messagebadend
string-array.item: Since my friends said "it is OK," while harmonizing with my friends, the winter holidays came.
Luckily, I received the programs from somewhere, then, I managed to submit a report to which I included it.
But, I received a grade of D. I failed the class. I don\'t know what my fault is.
